question:
Which of the following in India have given evidence of occurrence of Uranium in India?
  1. Aravalli belt in Rajasthan
  2. Bhima basin in Karnataka
  3. Son valley in Uttar Pradesh
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: AMD has so far established 1,97,621 tonnes in situ U3O8 (1,67,582 tonne U) reserves as on September, 2013, out of which 22,611 tonnes U3O8 (19,174 tonnes ) has been added during the F.Y 2012-13 and 2013-14 (till September 2013). Additional Uranium reserves have been recently established at Tummalapalle and Chitrial in Andhra Pradesh; Rohil in Rajasthan, Banadungri-Singridungri, Narwapahar extension and Bangurdih in Jharkhand; and Wahkut, Umthongkut and Lostoin in Meghalaya.
